tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE site_coordinates (
  site_id INT,
  measurement_date DATE NOT NULL,
  latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES landfill_sites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_coordinates (
    coordinate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES landfill_sites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    date_recorded DATE,
    opened BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES landfill_sites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    log_info TEXT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES landfill_sites(site_id)
);
